name: BEST WESTERN Tamarindo Vista Villas

reviews.text: I had a great time at the Vista Villas. The service was very friendly, the restaurant very accessible, and the pool always enjoyable. The restaurant and the pool are contiguous, so you can sit in the pool while enjoying a drink at the bar. The employees, especially Fernando, Evelyn, Erika, Javier, Gilberto and Adofo were very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Great view, good times!

reviews.text: I would love to return to the Vista Villas as soon as possible!
reviews.title: Can't wait to come back next year!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I along with our two kids - 8 and 9 - just returned from a 10-day stay at Tamarindo Vista Villas. We had an awesome time. The staff at the hotel were able to recomend activities that we could enjoy every day. The kids were alway so exhausted by the end of the day that they crashed and mom & dad got to enjoy more - like the party at the Monkey Bar. We had two ocean facing rooms and contrary to what I've read in some other reviews, our rooms were clean and every thing worked. The pool was clean and the beach and ocean too. I surfed everyday and taught my son to surf, as well. The staff was very nice and they all spoke English but tolerated our gringo Spanish with good humor as well. Pura Vida!
reviews.title: Excellent and accomodating staff, Great ocean views!

reviews.text: We stayed at the Villa Vista last year May, 2011 and returned again this year May 2012 (same room) the staff is very friendly, rooms are VERY clean, great ocean views and yes every friday they have a party at the restaurant/ monkey bar, they not only give you notice but, invite to partake in the fun, I think they help you find other accommodations for the night as well?? Bottom line, its clean, ocean view, safe and great staff and the price is right! Its Costa Rica!
reviews.title: Friends from Out of Town loved Vista Villas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks so much to the Best Western in Tamarindo, my best friend and his family were here recently and could not have been happier, I normally do not write reviews but I felt the need after receiving such warm service. Everything a family could need is right at your fingertips we were able to surf with the boys and all we had to do was walk across the street. The rooms had a kitchen so we were able to enjoy an ocean view and save on restaurant costs, and the restaurant at the hotel also had a very kid friendly menu when we did not want to cook. My friends wife was able to get a manicure and a massage in house, and my buddy even got his teeth whitened while he was here for only 200 bucks. ($1000 in the states) If you want a family environment with good service then I happily recommend the Best Western in Tamarindo.
reviews.title: Great Ocean View, good service.

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for a couple days with a group of friends - someone else picked the hotel, so I wasn't sure even what to expect. The hotel was perfect though. It is a little rough around the edges, but the location is great, the staff excellent, and the place is very clean. For the price, I don't think you could find anything better. It has a nice, relaxed, funky vibe. Great place to chill and use as a base to explore the local area.
reviews.title: Loved this funky little hotel

reviews.text: Our room was small, but absolutely clean and comfortable. The bathroom was nice, decent size, and everything worked well.
reviews.title: My home away from home

reviews.text: The pool area isn't fancy, but it is nice with a swim up bar and wonderful bartenders. In fact, the staff at this hotel was top notch. Everybody was great.
reviews.title: Amazing Views, Fair Price
Adequate hotel, great staff.
reviews.text: The location of the hotel is on the edge of Tamarindo, right as you come into town, across the street from the beach. So the location is quiet, but an easy walk into the main part of town.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I have stayed at the Vista Villas more than once and we love it. The entire staff is courteous and helpful. The rooms are clean and nice. Above all, the view of the beach is amazing. If you want a perfect spot to see the sun rise or set, stay here!
reviews.title: Friendly Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel exceeded my expectations. The included breakfast was more than adequate. The location was ideal and you can not beat the price. The food and drinks were good and my son and I especially enjoyed the Hawaiian pizza. The staff and service was far above what you would expect from a hotel in this price range. The staff - Trevor was in the breakfast area most mornings and went out of his way to make sure we were enjoying our stay and that we were happy with our room. He made many great suggestions for things we might enjoy and even drew us a custom map to get to Playa Conchal for snorkeling. His advice was spot on and we experienced many beautiful uncrowded beaches. I also must mention Fernando. He would have delicious fruit smoothies made for my son before he could even have time to ask for one and he loaned us his personal boogie board for my son to use on our last day so we didn't have to rent one. Our housekeeper Maria was also great. She recognized a flip flop after noticing my son only had one in the room and she returned it to us. She also did a great job cleaning our room and made it so comfortable to lay in a clean bed after being in the ocean and covered with sand all day. The Friday night party was awesome with great music and great drinks. My son and his friend really enjoyed jumping off the waterfall at the pool also. We enjoyed the sunsets from the All in all I would definitely stay here again if I travel back to Tamarindo. I don't think you will find better service and staff in this price range.
reviews.title: THE BEST VACATION ON A BUDGET

reviews.text: Good friendly staff, especially Adolfo, Floribeth and Trevor. Unfortunate experience with neighbours who complained about our children making noise at 8.30 a.m!! neighbours who also happened to be smoking in non-smoking areas. The location of the swimmimg pool, in the restaurant area basically, is maybe not the best when you are with young children who could easliy slip off the walk area in to the pool. Great view of the beach and the ocean in the early morning!!
reviews.title: On the road in Guanacaste with two young kids

reviews.text: Unfortunately, there were serious problems with internet connection when we were there and we were not able to use it at all during our stay.
reviews.title: Great Place!!!

reviews.text: I've visited this hotel five times in the last 6 years. I've just spend a couple of days a few weeks ago with my family. It's a great place for staying in Tamarindo, has the best cost-benefit ratio. The room are always clean, big pool, nice view, excellent location. The Monkey bar has great food and prices. As a matter of fact I'm planning a new visit this comming October if not sooner.
reviews.title: Good, but not great. Good value.

reviews.text: The hotel is nicely located and the room was big with a great view. But the air conditioning and internet were quite variable and often off completely. The pool is old and turned my hair green (pre-wet your blond hair folks!). The staff was great and the value for your money is pretty good.
reviews.title: Just like a movie and the most eco-conscious hotel in the region

reviews.text: This list will read like credits of a film but that is because it is the incredible cast of characters that sets Tamarindo Vista Villas above all other resorts in the area.
reviews.title: Exceptional Value and Friendly Staff
